results.idea: Operating cashflow yield (cashflow_op / enterprise_value) z-scored
results.description: Uses cashflow_op and enterprise_value (both high userCount) to capture cash generation relative to firm value. Applied SUGGESTION1 (multiple datafields) by combining 2 fields; SUGGESTION2 not applied (no vector fields present); SUGGESTION3 applied: both fields have coverage 0.5 so ts_backfill() used; SUGGESTION4 applied: chose high userCount fields. Kept operators <=7 and datafields=2 per KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence set to 0.78 because cashflow yield is a stable value signal historically.

results.idea: Earnings-to-Enterprise Value (income / enterprise_value) momentum
results.description: Income divided by enterprise_value to find cheap profitable firms. SUGGESTION1: used 2 fields; SUGGESTION2: not applicable; SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill used for coverage 0.5; SUGGESTION4: income and enterprise_value are high userCount. Conforms to KEEP_IN_MIND limits. Confidence 0.75 based on classic value-profitability tradeoff.

results.idea: Revenue annualized growth surprise (ts_returns on revenue)
results.description: Capture firms with above-trend revenue growth using ts_returns on revenue. SUGGESTION1: single main field (revenue) to preserve signal; SUGGESTION2: none; SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill applied; SUGGESTION4: revenue chosen for high userCount. Within operator/datafield limits. Confidence 0.70 — revenue growth predictive but noisier.

results.idea: Accruals proxy: revenue - operating cashflow (short-term earnings quality)
results.description: Use difference between revenue and cashflow_op as a simple accruals/quality proxy. SUGGESTION1: used 2 fields; SUGGESTION2: none; SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill for both; SUGGESTION4: fields have strong coverage/userCount. Meets KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence 0.68 — accruals matter but noisy.

results.idea: Book-to-enterprise reversal: bookvalue_ps / enterprise_value
results.description: Value tilts via book-to-ev using bookvalue_ps and enterprise_value. SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields); SUGGESTION3 applied ts_backfill on both; SUGGESTION2 not applicable; SUGGESTION4 used high userCount fields. Kept operator/datafield limits. Confidence 0.73 — value signals persistent.

results.idea: Operating margin improvement: (income - operating_expense) / revenue
results.description: Proxy for margin expansion using income and revenue (2 fields). SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields; SUGGESTION3 applied ts_backfill to both; SUGGESTION2 not used; SUGGESTION4 prioritized high userCount fields. Kept operators <=7. Confidence 0.66 — margins informative but require normalization; moderate confidence.

results.idea: Cash-to-debt improvement: cash / debt_lt change signal
results.description: High cash relative to long-term debt signals optionality. SUGGESTION1: two fields cash and debt_lt; SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill applied; SUGGESTION4: both are high userCount; SUGGESTION2 not applied. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence 0.72.
